lyrics:
7 contributorsbroken hearts parade lyricsintro
oh oh oh oh oh oh
here we go
oh oh oh oh oh oh
oh oh oh oh oh oh

verse 1
we got problems we dont know how to solve them
everywhere we go we got some skeletons that follow
we got baggage you know were going to drag it
everywhere we go for everyone to see

chorus
and the broken hearts parade
and im putting my heart out on display
theres no masquerade
just a funeral march for love today

postchorus
the band strikes up and theyre playing our song
dressed in black and were singing along
to the broken hearts parade
and ive never been better then i am today
oh oh oh
oh oh oh
you might also likeverse 2
you got a question how do we get it started
i got an answer let go of your heart and
love it live it leave it and get into it
if you want to start it this is how you do it

chorus
and the broken hearts parade
and im putting my heart out on display
theres no masquerade
just a funeral march for love today

postchorus
the band strikes up and theyre playing our song
dressed in black and were singing along
to the broken hearts parade
and ive never been better then i am today

bridge
i used to lie awake at night and wonder when shes coming home
it used to be so hard to wake up everyday

chorus
the broken hearts parade
and im putting my heart out on display
theres no masquerade
just a funeral march for love today
postchorus
the band strikes up and theyre playing our song
dressed in black and were singing along
to the broken hearts parade
and ive never been better then i am today

outro
march on to the soul
the beating of a broken heart
stop put the rhythm to bed
to the beating of a broken heartembed
